I have a long torso, and I am plus size with b cups. Finding a swimsuit that is long enough for me and fits my body while also fitting my Itty bitty committee,  has been stressful, dare I say traumatizing. 8 years without a swimsuit (and not for lack of trying) and I come across this gem. It fits perfect, does what I need, covers what I want and fits my ladies! The fabric is a nice lightweight fabric not that heavy draping stuff plus size suits sometimes come in. I am so happy to finally have a suit that fits my unique body, I am so happy I get to have a cute swimsuit like all the other amazing women in my life. I actually cried, because after years of searching I was sure I was going to have to go through the return process, but no, I am keeping her and probably buying another!(or4)

评论概述: Fits perfectly, flattering cut, supports the bust

The bottom shorts fit just right, not too short or long on me, and higher waisted to accommodate [fl]abdominals. I'm considering buying another one in a different color.
